entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:36 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 2:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
